name: Hoshi
short: Hoshi is a Spacebar client built with Flutter and designed to be fully cross-platform
description:
Hoshi is a cross-platform Spacebar client built with Flutter, currently in devlopment. Expect bugs.

Hoshi works on:

* iOS
* Android
* Web
* Windows
* Linux
* macOS

The web version will be available when the first release is out.
note: Hoshi is devlopped by the same person behind Spacebar Explorer. That's why it's Trusted.
